Job Description -.Net Developer (IT Consultant Prior Experience with HR applications)
6+ Months
Columbus, Ohio (Need local with DL or Current project in Ohio)
Hybrid – days in office are on an ‘as needed’ basis, but no more than 2x weekly

Skype
IT Consultant to refactor an existing custom .net/C# Human Resources software suite hosted on Azure to meet the needs of our Agency and constituents. In addition to the attached technical proficiencies the selected candidate will demonstrate the ability to work directly with our Human Resource professionals, understand the basic terminology and business functions of HR, and have the ability to communicate verbally and in writing to the project sponsors. Prior experience with HR applications or processes is not mandatory but preferred. Having worked on an interface with Ohio’s ERP (OAKS) is also advantageous.

Mandatory skills
.NET Framework (4.7.2 and higher), .net core 2.2 and higher
Visual Studio (2022/2019)
SQL Server 2016
Asp.net MVC 5, MVC Core
Entity Framework 6.2 including LINQ to SQL, Entity framework core
Kendo UI Controls for ASP.NET MVC
Java Script, jQuery and CSS 3.0
C# 7.0 and higher
WCF/Web API
Visual Studio Unit Testing
Azure DevOps
Build and release using DevOps pipelines
Git source code repository (2 +)
Azure App Service (2 years)
Azure blob storage (< 1year)
